page.title: 08My family and me
page.content: We have 4 people in our family my mum,dad,sister and me.My sister will be a fifth year when I go to William Sharp.My dad works at the Post Office and my mum works part time in the Co-op.We have no pets but my mum wants a budgie.My dad always wakes up first and he says if we had a point system we would always draw with the girls. Because my dad gets up first he gets 4 points and I get 1 point because I always get up last.My mum and sister get 2 and 3 points(5-5).My mum works from 11.30 till 3.00pm and 9.00 till 12.00 on a Thursday.My dad goes to work at 7.30am till 5.30pm.My sister is in the school hockey,tennis and netball teams.I play for the school football team.
